metadata.title: EcoBloom Summer Campaign Timeline
metadata.summary: The team is planning EcoBloom's summer campaign with a firm deadline of July 28, 2025. Key discussion points included content and design timelines, legal reviews, and deliverable deadlines. Initial content is due June 30, 2025, designs by July 21, 2025, and legal review by July 14, 2025.

action_items.task: Have initial content ready for review
Complete designs based on content
Handle all legal reviews of marketing materials
Share initial designs for team feedback
Provide marketing materials for legal review

Key milestones were established, with a focus on compliance and ensuring marketing materials are ready by August 26, 2025, for legal review.

metadata.title: GreenScape Sustainability Report
metadata.summary: The team initiated GreenScape's annual sustainability report, aiming for completion by August 30, 2025. Discussions covered data acquisition, content creation, design, and legal review. Key milestones include content draft by August 10th and legal review by August 23rd, ensuring compliance with reporting standards.

action_items.task: Prepare questions for client call
Complete data visualization and design
Complete legal review of draft report

metadata.title: EcoBloom Design Revisions
metadata.summary: The team is revising EcoBloom's summer campaign designs based on client feedback, focusing on a color palette overhaul. Key dates include July 3rd for palette delivery, July 10th for revised concepts, July 12th for client review, and July 21st for legal review, all to meet the July 28th campaign launch deadline. Progress is being made on both design and content updates.

action_items.task: Prioritize color palette changes for EcoBloom
Adjust content to align with the new color palette
Finalize revised design concepts for client review
Prepare for expedited legal review of revised designs
Integrate revised designs with updated content

metadata.title: FitFusion Rebranding Legal Review
metadata.summary: The team addressed legal reviews for FitFusion's rebranding, focusing on trademark issues with taglines. Leah developed five alternative taglines, with option 4 ultimately approved by Jordan. The final designs and content are due July 28, 2025, for final legal review before the August 15, 2025 launch.

metadata.title: GreenScape Sustainability Report Extension
metadata.summary: The team discussed and approved an extension for GreenScape's sustainability report deadline from August 30, 2025, to September 15, 2025. This extension allows for higher quality deliverables and accommodates resource allocation for EcoBloom, FitFusion, and TechNova projects. All parties adjusted timelines accordingly.
